AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States Sentencing Commission Guid: Guidelines for federal sentencing, providing a framework for evaluating the fairness and appropriateness of sentences for individual offenders
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States District Court: Federal court imposing sentences, with judges considering all relevant factors in a case to impose a sentence outside the guidelines if necessary
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Senate Report No. 225: Report emphasizing the importance of thoughtful imposition of individualized sentences, highlighting the purpose of sentencing guidelines
